title: (x) 'Benga' - Diary Of An Afro Warrior Type? - modified Avant Garde Gothic {Chris L}
content:
Anyone have any idea what this font is.

The one that says BENGA

[http://atlantique.files.wordpress.com/2009/09/bengadiary.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100401075022/http:/atlantique.files.wordpress.com/2009/09/bengadiary.jpg "http://atlantique.files.wordpress.com/2009/09/bengadiary.jpg")
author: L1ONE

comments.content:
A variation on Avant Garde with some customization.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100401075022/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-avant-garde-gothic/")

ChrisL

Thanks for the quick reply.

I'm really interested in the A and the B; Any idea's on a similar ones? Or would best bet be to create them myself?

I would just draw them or at least piece them from "O" and "V". The "B" is easy, just opaque the crossbar.

ChrisL
